issues.title: Complete Final 7 Administrative Commands (Enhancement)
issues.description:
## Overview

Implement the final 7 administrative commands. These are enhancement/nice-to-have features, not production blockers.

## Status

**Current**: 100/107 commands complete (93.5%)
**Remaining**: 7 commands (all administrative)
**Priority**: LOW (enhancement, not required for production)

## Commands to Implement

1. **@ALLHALT** - Emergency halt all queued commands
   - File: WizardCommands.cs
   - Effort: 2-3 hours
   - Tests: Emergency scenarios, queue clearing

2. **@CHOWNALL** - Change ownership of all objects
   - File: WizardCommands.cs
   - Effort: 3-5 hours
   - Tests: Bulk ownership changes, preservation modes

3. **@POLL** - Polling/survey system
   - File: WizardCommands.cs
   - Effort: 2-4 hours
   - Tests: Poll creation, voting, results

4. **@PURGE** - Purge inactive objects
   - File: WizardCommands.cs  
   - Effort: 3-5 hours
   - Tests: Inactivity detection, object removal

5. **@READCACHE** - Display cache statistics
   - File: WizardCommands.cs
   - Effort: 2-3 hours
   - Tests: Cache metrics display

6. **@SHUTDOWN** - Server shutdown
   - File: WizardCommands.cs
   - Effort: 2-4 hours
   - Tests: Graceful shutdown, panic mode, reboot

7. **@SUGGEST** - Suggestion system  
   - File: WizardCommands.cs
   - Effort: 2-4 hours
   - Tests: Suggestion submission, listing, management

## Testing Requirements

- Unique test strings: `"test_admin_COMMANDNAME_scenario"`
- Permission validation (WIZARD flag required)
- Edge case coverage
- Integration with existing systems

## Dependencies

None - all required services are implemented.

## Notes

- These are administrative/wizard-only commands
- Not required for basic MUSH operation
- Can be implemented based on user demand
- Already have command lock specifications

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All 7 commands implemented
- [ ] Comprehensive unit tests
- [ ] Permission checks working
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] 100% command completion achieved

issues.title: Implement Hook System (Future Feature)
issues.description:
## Overview

Implement the Hook System to replace the current placeholder implementation.

## Status

**Current**: 15% complete (interface exists)
**Target**: 100% complete
**Priority**: MEDIUM (future feature, not production blocker)

## Work Required

### Interface (Complete)
- ✅ IHookService interface well-designed
- ✅ Hook registration methods defined
- ✅ Hook invocation patterns established

### Implementation (Needed)
- [ ] Replace placeholder implementation
- [ ] Command hooks (@before/@after)
- [ ] Function hooks
- [ ] Attribute hooks
- [ ] System hooks
- [ ] Hook priority system
- [ ] Hook chaining
- [ ] Hook cancellation

## Testing Requirements

- Hook registration and invocation
- Priority ordering
- Cancellation propagation  
- Performance impact minimal
- Thread safety

## Dependencies

None - can be implemented independently.

## Notes

- Current placeholder doesn't block core functionality
- Useful for advanced customization
- Can be implemented post-production

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Hook registration working
- [ ] Hook invocation functional
- [ ] Priority system operational
- [ ] Comprehensive tests
- [ ] Performance acceptable

issues.title: Complete Move System Implementation (Future Feature)
issues.description:
## Overview

Complete the Move System implementation for object movement mechanics.

## Status

**Current**: 35% complete (interface exists)
**Target**: 100% complete
**Priority**: MEDIUM (future feature, basic movement works)

## Work Required

### Interface (Complete)
- ✅ IMoveService interface defined
- ✅ Basic movement methods specified

### Implementation (Needed)
- [ ] Complete move mechanics
- [ ] Enter/Leave hooks
- [ ] Move costs
- [ ] Move verbs customization
- [ ] Teleportation handling
- [ ] Movement restrictions
- [ ] Zone-based movement
- [ ] Follow/unfollow integration

## Testing Requirements

- Movement success/failure scenarios
- Permission checks
- Hook invocation
- Cost calculations
- Zone boundary handling

## Dependencies

- Hook system (for Enter/Leave hooks)
- Zone infrastructure (complete)

## Notes

- Basic movement already works via other systems
- Full implementation adds advanced features
- Can be enhanced post-production

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All movement types working
- [ ] Hooks integrated
- [ ] Costs calculated correctly
- [ ] Zone handling complete
- [ ] Comprehensive tests

issues.title: Queue System Enhancements (Future Feature)
issues.description:
## Overview

Enhance the Queue System with additional PennMUSH-compatible features.

## Status

**Current**: 90% complete (core working)
**Target**: 100% complete
**Priority**: LOW (core queue functional)

## Work Required

### Complete Features
- ✅ Basic queuing
- ✅ Queue execution
- ✅ Queue management

### Enhancements Needed
- [ ] Priority queue system
- [ ] WAIT queue separation  
- [ ] INDEPENDENT queue type
- [ ] Break propagation
- [ ] Queue_chunk configuration
- [ ] Queue statistics
- [ ] Queue debugging commands

## Testing Requirements

- Queue priority ordering
- WAIT/INDEPENDENT behavior
- Break handling
- Performance under load
- Queue limits

## Dependencies

None - can be enhanced independently.

## Notes

- Current queue system works well
- Enhancements add PennMUSH parity
- Can be implemented based on user needs

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Priority system working
- [ ] WAIT/INDEPENDENT queues functional
- [ ] Break propagation correct
- [ ] Configuration options available
- [ ] Comprehensive tests

issues.title: Parser Edge Case Refinements (Enhancement)
issues.description:
## Overview

Address remaining parser edge cases and refinements.

## Status

**Current**: 93% complete (parser works well)
**Target**: 100% complete
**Priority**: LOW (core parser functional)

## Work Required

### Complete Features
- ✅ Basic parsing
- ✅ Function evaluation
- ✅ Substitution handling
- ✅ Nesting support
- ✅ Most edge cases

### Refinements Needed (14 TODOs)
- [ ] Obscure nesting scenarios
- [ ] Rare escape sequences
- [ ] Complex substitution edge cases
- [ ] Performance optimizations
- [ ] Error message improvements
- [ ] Unicode handling edge cases

## Testing Requirements

- Edge case coverage
- Performance regression tests
- Unicode compatibility
- Error message clarity

## Dependencies

None - parser is self-contained.

## Notes

- Parser works well for common cases
- Refinements improve edge case handling
- Low priority for production

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All known edge cases handled
- [ ] Performance maintained
- [ ] Error messages clear
- [ ] Comprehensive tests

issues.title: Enhancement TODO Backlog (65 Items)
issues.description:
## Overview

Address the backlog of 65 major enhancement TODOs across the codebase.

## Status

**Current**: 65 major enhancement TODOs
**Priority**: LOW (enhancements, not critical)

## Distribution

### By File
- GeneralCommands.cs: 54 enhancements
- Other files: 11 enhancements

### Categories
- Command enhancements: ~40
- Service improvements: ~10
- Function additions: ~8  
- Infrastructure polish: ~7

## Work Required

- [ ] Review each TODO for user value
- [ ] Prioritize based on production feedback
- [ ] Implement high-value enhancements
- [ ] Test thoroughly
- [ ] Document changes

## Testing Requirements

- Per-enhancement testing
- Regression testing
- Integration validation

## Dependencies

Varies by enhancement.

## Notes

- Most are polish/nice-to-have
- Should be prioritized by user demand
- Can be addressed incrementally
- Not required for production

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] TODOs reviewed and prioritized
- [ ] High-value items implemented
- [ ] Tests updated
- [ ] Documentation current

summary.note: All remaining work is enhancement/future features. SharpMUSH is production-ready.
